Somali.Leading book keeping tool for investment:
Qalabka ilaalinta buugaagta hormuudka u ah kooxaha maal-gashiga ee gacanta ku haya dhammaan maamulkaaga maaliyadeed sida
 waxaad diirada saartaa maalgelintaada.
Somali....it's easy to use & secure\r\n: ... way fududahay in la isticmaalo oo la ilaaliyo
Somali.Financial information stored on Chamasof:
Macluumaad maaliyadeed oo ku kaydsan Chamasoft waxa kaliya oo ay arki karaan isticmaalayaasha idman. La xidhiidhka serfaradayada
 waa qarsoodi.
Somali....accessible everywhere, anytime!\r\n: ... meel walba laga heli karo, wakhti kasta!
Somali.Chamasoft is available 24/7 from anywher:
Chamasoft waa laga heli karaa 24/7 meel kasta oo adduunka ka mid ah iyada oo loo marayo aalado kala duwan: USSD, Web, Android & iOS.
Bilow hadda.

Somali.That everytime you have your regular gro:
Taas mar kasta oo aad leedahay shirarka kooxdaada caadiga ah, Chamasoft waxay kaa caawineysaa inaad sii wadato
 daqiiqadaha tixraaca mustaqbalka, iyo sidoo kale duub wixii macaamil ganacsi ah.
Somali.Follow all the steps and provide all req:
Raac tillaabooyinka oo dhan oo bixi dhammaan xogta loo baahan yahay ee ku saabsan kulankaan. Waad awoodi doontaa
 dib u eeg warbixin kooban oo ku saabsan kulanka ka hor intaadan gudbin.
